title: Ace the Interview!
details: Ace the Interview! is a single-page application (SPA) for job seekers who want to practice their interview skills.
author: Kaoru

title: Little Library
details: Little library is for keeping track of ‘Little Libraries’
author: Kaoru & Jeff
stacks: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Fire Base, react-google-maps, JWTs

title: Find Meow!
details: Find Me-ow! is an app to help to unite lost cats and found cats with their owners.
author: Kaoru, Mei & Walid
stacks: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, react-google-maps, react-dom, bcryptjs, axios

title: Scheduler
details: Interview Scheduler is a one page application built with React using Jest, Storybook, and Cypress for arranging interview schedules.
author: Kaoru
